#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int test;
        cin >> test;
    while(test--) {
        long long int a, b, ar[100001], br[100001], r1 = 0, r2 = 0;
        cin >> a >> b;
        while(a) {
            ar[r1] = a % 10;
            a = a / 10;
            r1++;
        }

        while(b) {
            br[r2] = b % 10;
            b = b / 10;
            r2++;
        }
        long long int i = 0, j = 0;

        while(i < r1) {
            a = a * 10;
            a = a + ar[i];
            i++;
        }

        while(j < r2) {
            b = b * 10;
            b = b + br[j];
            j++;
        }
        a = a + b;
        long long int flag = 0;
        while(a) {
            if(a % 10 == 0 && flag == 0) {
                a = a / 10;
            }
            else {
                flag = 1;
                cout << a % 10;
                a = a / 10;
            }
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
